mapper.select: SELECT A.MM_CD AS ID , A.MM_UPR_CD AS PARENT , A.MM_NAME AS TEXT , A.MM_IDX AS IDX , CASE WHEN A.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM EZ_MGR_AUTHORITY WHERE MA_TYPE = 'menu' AND MA_MLIDX=#{roleIdx} AND MA_PKIDX=A.MM_IDX) END AS SAVE_CHK , LEVEL-1 AS DEPTH FROM EZ_MGR_MENU A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH A.MM_UPR_CD = '#' CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR A.MM_CD = A.MM_UPR_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORD_NO ASC

SELECT A.CB_CD AS ID , A.CB_UPR_CD AS PARENT , A.CB_NAME AS TEXT , A.CB_IDX AS IDX , CASE WHEN A.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM EZ_MGR_AUTHORITY WHERE MA_TYPE = 'board' AND MA_MLIDX = #{roleIdx} AND MA_PKIDX=A.CB_IDX) END AS SAVE_CHK , LEVEL-1 AS DEPTH FROM EZ_CMS_BBS A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH A.CB_UPR_CD = '#' CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR A.CB_CD = A.CB_UPR_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.ORD_NO ASC

SELECT MENU_CODE AS ID, SUBSTR(REPLACE(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.MENU_CODE,'>'),'>'||MENU_CODE,''),-23) AS PARENT, A.MENU_NM as TEXT, MENU_CODE AS IDX, MENU_DEPTH AS DEPTH, SAVE_CHK FROM (SELECT MENU_NM , MENU_DEPTH , B.MENU_CODE , SORT_ORDER , MENU_TYPE, USER_MENU_URL, NVL2(C.MA_PKIDX,'Y','N') AS SAVE_CHK, CASE WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 1 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 2), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 2 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 3), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 3 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 5), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 4 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 7), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 5 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 9), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 6 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 11), 13, '0') WHEN MENU_DEPTH = 7 THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(SORT_ORDER, 1, 13), 13, '0') ELSE '0' END PARENT ,B.SITE_CD FROM EZ_USER_MENU B, EZ_MGR_AUTHORITY C WHERE B.MENU_CODE = C.MA_PKIDX(+) AND B.USE_YN='Y' AND C.MA_TYPE(+)=#{searchType} AND C.MA_MLIDX(+)= #{roleIdx} AND B.SITE_CD=#{searchType} ) A START WITH A.PARENT = '0' CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR A.SORT_ORDER = A.PARENT ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER
